MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL24 postcode area of Betws Y Coed, affecting properties in Rhydlydan and surrounding areas. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.12PM for urgent overhead line repairs. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.34PM on 29th March 2021
